Player History
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/21/1985 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/24/1988...
Traded from Montreal to Los Angeles on 6/10/1989 (Going to LAD: P Mark Davis, P Manny Hernandez, P Roy Smith. Going to MON: LF Keith Mitchell, RF Lou Frazier)...
Had first career hit on 6/25/1989, off Rod Nichols (SD)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
